achievements.name: The Mad Flower at the End of the Road
achievements.desc: When the Electro Regisvine emits a beam of thunderous light, paralyze it by attacking its corolla.

achievements.name: I Can't Take It Anymore!
achievements.desc: Defeat the exhausted Jadeplume Terrorshroom after its Activated state is finished.

achievements.name: The Smell of Grilled Mushrooms in the Morning
achievements.desc: In a single challenge, defeat 6 Fungi produced by Jadeplume Terrorshroom in a Burning state.

achievements.name: Dragonslayer
achievements.desc: In a single challenge, bring the Aeonblight Drake down by attacking the cores on its wings.

achievements.name: Victory is a Mindset
achievements.desc: In a single challenge, interrupt the energy flow of the Aeonblight Drake by attacking the core on its head.

achievements.name: Resistance is Futile!
achievements.desc: Defeat an Aeonblight Drake that has increased resistance to at least two different elements.

achievements.name: System Shock
achievements.desc: Defeat the Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network in its overclocked, Overloaded state.

achievements.name: Daisy, Daisy
achievements.desc: Break the Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network by hitting its cores with the Quicken, Aggravate, or Spread reactions.
